posts.post_content:
Posted By: PC
Looking for the following "common" T206 cards graded by SGC or PSA, in grades 1-4, with common backs (not looking for rare backs).

Willing to pay the following prices, shipped (by PayPal or personal check):

GRADES/PRICES:
1/10 = $18
20 = $22
2/30 = $27
3/40 = $37
4/50 = $50

CARDS NEEDED:
Whitey Alperman
Red Ames (hands at chest)
Neal Ball (New York)
Ginger Beaumont
Kitty Bransfield
Al Burch (batting)
Wid Conroy (fielding)
**Wid Conroy (with bat)** PURCHASED
Harry Covaleski
Bill Dahlen (Boston)
Paul Davidson
Mickey Doolin (portrait)
Patsy Dougherty (portrait)
Joe Dunn (Brooklyn)
Kid Elberfeld (New York)
Clyde Engle
Russ Ford
Bob Ganley
Rube Geyer
Buck Herzog (Boston)
Danny Hoffman (St. Louis)
Rudy Hulswitt
Ed Killian (portrait)
Red Kleinow (New York – catching)
Red Kleinow (New York – with bat)
Johnny Kling
Arlie Latham
Glenn Liebhardt
Vive Lindaman
George McQuillan (ball in hand)
Fred Merkle (portrait)
Clyde Milan
Herbie Moran (Providence)
**George Mullin (with bat)** PURCHASED
William O'Neil
**Orval Overall (hand face level)** PURCHASED
Ed Reulbach (glove showing)
Germany Schaefer (Detroit)
Jim Scott
Hunky Shaw (Providence)
Bob Spade
George Stovall (batting)
George Stovall (portrait)
Ed Summers
Jeff Sweeney (New York)
Lee Tannehill (Chicago with L. Tannehill on front)
Kaiser Wilhelm (with bat)
Ed Willett (note: with bat -- not Ed Willetts/throwing)
Hooks Wiltse (portrait with cap)


For 1s, looking for "presentable" for the grade (meaning closer to 1 than 0, no holes, pieces missing, etc.).  

Thanks

[edited to reflect cards purchased]
